summary: The Green Star Families Act aims to establish a counseling program for the next of kin and former volunteer caregivers of veterans who die by suicide. The Secretary of Veterans Affairs will provide counseling services at no cost, considering accessibility and equivalence to existing services. The bill also mandates public awareness initiatives. It includes definitions for key terms like "covered veterans service organization," "former volunteer caregiver," and "next of kin," establishing a specific order of priority. The Secretary must implement this program within 90 days of the Act's enactment.
